description:
Do all your banking with SA's Best Digital Bank as rated in the SITEisfaction 2021 report. 

The Capitec Bank app is secure, easy to use and you pay no data charges on most of the major SA networks when using the app.

We've cut the cost of banking by using innovative technology. This means lower transaction fees when you use our app – putting the value back in your pocket.

Transact

• Open a Capitec account simply by taking a few selfies and scanning your ID
• Get your card delivered to your door at a fee, or collect it at a branch for free
• Reset your forgotten Remote app PIN without visiting a branch
• Buy and sell shares and save 20% on brokerage fees across all trades with EasyEquities
• Scan to pay all the major QR codes straight from the app
• Get free transaction updates with in-app Money In/Money Out messages
• Keep track of how you're spending your money
• Send cash to friends and family to collect at selected retailers and Capitec ATMs
• Update your card withdrawal and purchase limits
• Manage contactless card transactions by turning tap to pay on and off
• Update your tap to pay limit
• Stop lost or stolen cards immediately
• Manage your debit orders and DebiCheck mandates
• Email electronically stamped statements
• Pay people and accounts
• Make immediate payments to other banks in SA
• Pay DStv, SARS eFiling or TV Licence immediately
• Pay Capitec clients using only their verified cellphone numbers
• Buy prepaid electricity, airtime, data and SMS bundles
• Manage your Internet banking by turning it on and off

Save

• Open, personalise and manage 4 additional savings plans
• Fix your savings plans to earn higher interest

Insure

• Get a free estimate on the app
• Get your funeral plan and manage it 24/7

Credit

• Get a free personalised credit estimate
• Manage your credit on the app

Once you've registered and activated the app, remember to keep your:

• Remote PlN secret
• Cellphone safe and in your possession at all times
Payflex offers an online and instore payment solution that allows you to buy now and pay in 3 or 4 equal instalments, at 0% interest
South Africa’s risk-free, #INTERESTFREE payment solution.

The FNB Banking App embraces the future of help and our new look and feel will do just that 
Some features to look out for: 

Simple straight-forward navigation – We’ve added bottom navigation to make it easier to find what you need, when you need it. 
Switch users easily – Multiple profiles?  No problem!  Switch seamlessly between different user profiles by selecting profiles located on the bottom navigation and then select “switch user”. 
Introducing the Action Panel – Bringing your banking features front and center, like payments, transfers, my cards, and cash withdrawals. 
Chat Pay – A revolutionary new feature called Chat Pay that allows you to pay any FNB customer via a simple chat, all within FNB’s secure ecosystem giving you peace of mind that the person you are paying has been verified and approved.  It’s that simple. 

What is Pay? 
We have renamed Payments to Pay.  This feature will provide you with access to categories within payments such as pay, receive, pay bills, payment settings, and payment history. 

What is Secure Messaging? 
Chat to other FNB/RMB customers securely on the App by granting access to your contact list.  Features within Secure Messaging include Chat Pay, voice notes, attachments, share location, etc.

No paperwork. No monthly fees. No stress. Just smart, simple, low-cost banking that gives you a clear picture of every cent you earn and spend. Transact online, on your phone, or at more than 1000 Boxer, Pick n Pay and TFG stores across the country. You’ve got this.

Here’s just some of the features you can look forward to:

Buy with MoreTyme by TymeBank
Forget store account interest. Forget waiting on lay-by. With MoreTyme, you can get what you need now, and pay for it in 3 interest-free instalments (subject to approval).

SendMoney to a cellphone number
What if you need to send money to someone who doesn’t have a bank account? No problem. The TymeBank app allows you to SendMoney to anyone with a valid South African cell number.
 
Build up your savings with GoalSave
Enjoy one of the best interest savings rates in Mzansi (up to 10%). Watch it grow with your money across as many as 10 different GoalSave accounts.

Easily pay your accounts
Pay the accounts you have with all kinds of service providers like broadcasters, stores, credit cards, municipalities and educational institutions. All you need is your account number as the reference.

There’s more to discover in the app. So go ahead and download it now to open your account. It’s free!

Enjoy seamless and secure mobile banking on the Nedbank Money app. Simplify your finances conveniently at your fingertips. Enjoy a wide range of features like the functionality to bank from anywhere at anytime, personalised investment solutions, free credit score reports and shopping deals on the Avo SuperShop. Download the Nedbank Money app today and choose the bank that’s best for your money.


Features:


1. Safe and secure banking 24/7:  Access your Nedbank accounts at anywhere and anytime and stay on top of your finances.
  

2. Enhanced security with biometric login:  Bank safer with biometric authentication, such as FaceID or TouchID. Bank with peace of mind knowing that your accounts are protected by world-class security features. 


3. Instant money transfers:  Instantly transfer money between your accounts or make instant payments to other banks in just a few taps. 


4. Personalised investment solutions:  Invest for the future you want with unique investment solutions using the investment calculator and get access to a range of investment accounts.


5. Free credit score reports:  Make informed decisions about your financial health with free monthly credit score checks. Improve your score and make better money choices.


6. Loans and interest rates:  Apply for a loan when you need it most in minutes. Stay on track of current interest rates and repayments on the app. 


7. Bill payments and prepaid services:  Never miss a monthly payment again. Pay your bills and buy airtime, data, and electricity at your fingertips.


8. Shop deals on Avo by Nedbank:  Shop deals from your favourite brands on Avo by Nedbank. Discover exciting deals, exclusive offers, and enjoy a hassle-free shopping experience.


9. Manage your cards:  Switch to virtual cards for online payments or manage your physical cards on the app. Manage your card limits, view transaction history, block and freeze lost and stolen cards and access other card-related services.


10. Find an ATM or branch:  Find nearby ATMs and Nedbank branches using the in-app map. 


11. Get real-time notifications:  Stay on top of your money goals with real-time transaction notifications and account activity alerts. 



Enjoy convenient banking in the palm of your hand with the Nedbank Money app. Download it now and choose the bank that’s best for your money.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Convenient and innovative banking at your fingertips with the award-winning Absa Banking App 24/7. 
 
Enjoy full control of your bank accounts: 
 
•	Approve and reject transactions for increased banking security. 
•	Keep your money secure with advanced facial biometrics.  
•	Get a free Digital Fraud Warranty for all your digital transactions.
•	Stop and replace your card faster if it gets lost.

Simplify your banking:

•	Pay someone instantly with PayShap. 
•	Reverse debit orders that you did not authorise.

Manage your money on the go:

•	Get stamped bank statements and avoid visiting branches.

The SARS eFiling App is an innovation from the South African Revenue Service (SARS) that will appeal to the new generation of mobile taxpayers. c, tablets or iPads and receive their assessment. The SARS eFiling App brings simple convenient, easy and secure eFiling to the palm of your hand, anytime, anywhere.
You can use the SARS eFiling App to: 

•Register as an eFiler
•Retrieve your username and/or password
•View, complete and submit your annual Income Tax Return (ITR12) 
•Use the tax calculator to get an indication of your assessment outcome 
•View the status of your return once submitted 
•Upload supporting documents
•View a summary of your Notice of Assessment (ITA34) 
•Request and view your Statement of Account (ITSA)
•Request Notice of Registration
•View Correspondence

developer: The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited
description:
Your money, your way

Easily track your finances, discover tools and features to help you manage your money, and explore personalised offers – all at your fingertips.

Effortless day-to-day banking

• Quick payments and transfers: Send money with ease
• Top up instantly: Buy airtime, data, SMS bundles, and electricity
• Send money vouchers: Share cash vouchers to anyone with a cellphone
• Hassle-free international payments: Make global transactions in just a few taps
• Play Lotto: Try your luck directly from the app

Take control of your money

• Open a savings account online: Start saving in minutes
• Manage your cards: Set payment limits, stop or replace cards quickly
• Access documents on-demand: Get stamped statements, bank letters and tax certificates
• Quick balance checks: View your balances without signing in
• Track insurance claims: Submit and monitor your building insurance claims easily

Everything you need, all in one place

• One view of all your accounts: See all your Standard Bank accounts in one convenient place
• Manage your loans: Handle your personal, vehicle and home loans with ease
• Get vehicle loan pre-approval: Apply for pre-approval in just a few taps
• Link your accounts to trading: Manage your share trading profile directly from the app
• Monitor your investments: View your Stanlib investments anytime, anywhere

Note: Availability of some features may vary depending on your region.

Your app will automatically update to ensure you always have the latest features and security upgrades.

Getting started

Simply download the app using data (charges apply for the initial download), but once you’re set-up, there are no data charges when using the app. As long as you have a connection, your banking is ready to go!

Transactional features are available to Standard Bank accounts held in South Africa, Ghana, Uganda, Botswana, Zimbabwe, Zambia, Tanzania, Lesotho, Malawi, eSwatini and Namibia. Keep in mind that some types of payments include transaction fees.  

Legal info  

The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited is a licensed financial services provider in terms of the Financial Advisory and Intermediary Services Act; and is a registered credit provider in terms of the National Credit Act, registration number NCRCP15.  

Stanbic Bank Botswana Limited is a Company (registration number: 1991/1343) incorporated in the Republic of Botswana and a registered commercial bank. Namibia: Standard Bank is a licensed banking institution in terms of the Banking Institutions Act, registration number 78/01799. Stanbic Bank Uganda Limited is regulated by the Bank of Uganda.

Discovery Bank is the next generation in digital banking. The Future of Banking. Now.


Welcome to the world’s first fully digital shared-value bank. Sign up in under 5 minutes anytime, anywhere and have a bank branch in the palm of your hand.


Discovery Bank offers some of the best interest rates in the market, revolutionised digital payments, advanced Discovery AI technology to enhance your banking experience, and SA’s best client experience to make life easier, more exciting, and more rewarding. Unlock a world of rewards with Ðiscovery Miles – the rewards currency worth more than cash – and access Vitality Travel to get up to 75% off local and international flights.


A full bank branch at your fingertips:
o Sign up in under 5 minutes, get free virtual cards and start transacting immediately.

Pay anyone, anywhere, anytime:

Access products that enrich your life:

o Open free savings accounts in minutes get some of the best interest rates.

Upgrade your travel experience with Vitality Travel:

o Get exclusive access to The Lounge, by Discovery Bank and SAA, for an elevated pre-flight experience.
o Skip the queues at security clearance and car hire with Priority Fast Track and Europcar Ready2GO.



Unlock a world of rewards with up to:
o 75% off local and international flights
o 75% back on HealthyFood items at Checkers and Woolworths
o 50% back on HealthyCare items at Clicks and Dis-Chem
o 20% back on fuel spend at bp and select Shell stations
o 20% back on Uber rides.



Earn and spend Ðiscovery Miles:
o Earn Ðiscovery Miles every time you use your Discovery Bank virtual card.
o Earn Ðiscovery Miles through Vitality Active Rewards (when you exercise, drive well, or spend responsibly), and for Vitality lifestyle rewards.
o Get up to 15% off when you spend your Ðiscovery Miles in-store and online every day – this doubles to up to 30% off on Miles Ð-Day on the 15th of every month.
o Buy prepaid products like airtime, data, SMS bundles, water and electricity and get up to 15% off.
o Buy entertainment vouchers for Blu Voucher, Roblox and more – with up to 15% off select vouchers.
o You can also use Ðiscovery Miles to pay for travel, send them to contacts or convert them to cash.



Auth FSP. Limits (incl. fair usage), Ts&Cs apply.

It takes more than a good credit score to access good credit. For that, you need to get credit healthy. Introducing Credit Health from ClearScore. All new, all powerful. 

Go beyond your credit score and report and see how you look to lenders – giving you the most accurate picture of your financial journey. See your disposable income, how much debt you have, and much more. 

Frightened by fraud? Get peace of mind. ClearScore Protect keeps you and your important information safer. We monitor your credit report and let you know if something isn’t quite right. If you want to take it a step further, you can choose Protect Plus – a paid for service. You’ll access daily updates, enhanced monitoring, and more.

Confused by credit? We simplify it. Let the experts at ClearScore coach you to better Credit Health. Discover Improve and enjoy short, sharp, snappy videos designed to help you navigate the confusing world of credit, with confidence. 

Want to save money? Explore your personalised offers based on you and your goals. See what you could save and access the money you’re looking for. 

▶ Features

• Get your credit score and report – for free, forever
• Discover the fuller picture with an overview of your accounts, payment history, debt, and more
• Keep your important information safer and get alerts when something’s not quite right
• Improve your credit score over time, with simple explanations and step-by-step guides from our experts
• See what you could save with offers, tailored to you

▶ Signing up is quick and easy. All you need to do is:

1. Enter some details about yourself so we can match you to your credit file
2. Go through our security checks to make sure only you have access to your information
3. Explore your credit score and report

Your credit score is just the beginning. 

ClearScore is a credit broker, not a lender.

▶ For the UK:

• ClearScore is safe, secure and FCA Regulated 
• We are regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and comply strictly with the 2018 Data Protection Act 
• Your information is kept safe using the most robust and secure systems and processes 
• We never sell your details or send you spam 
• We make our money through commission (if you take out a credit product via ClearScore) 

Get greater peace of mind with Protect Plus. 

Protect, our dark web monitoring service, is free, forever. Want the ultimate protection? Subscribe to Protect Plus for just £7.99 per month. You can search additional emails, uncover more stolen personal data, like your bank account details and address, and access dedicated live support. 

Subscriptions renew each month automatically and will be charged to your iTunes account within 24-hours of the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renewal at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase - but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. These prices are for United Kingdom customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence. 

Privacy Policy: https://www.clearscore.com/privacy-policy 

Terms of Use: https://www.clearscore.com/terms

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

Low Cost, Easy Investing

Secure & Trusted Platform
•	Cutting-edge security to protect your portfolio and personal information.


© EasyEquities. First World Trader (Pty) Ltd t/a EasyEquities is an authorized Financial Services Provider (FSP number 22588). All trades on the EasyEquities platform are subject to the legal terms and conditions to which you agree to be bound. 

The EasyEquities platform enables users to invest in securities which includes whole shares and fractional share rights (FSRs). EasyEquities acts as an agent for the issue of whole shares, where the investor is the registered owner of those shares, entitled to dividends, participation in corporate actions and all the economic benefits and risks associated with share ownership. In respect of FSRs, EasyEquities acts as principal to a contract for difference issued to the investor, where the investor will have a contractual claim against EasyEquities to the economic benefits and risks associated with share ownership (price movements and dividends) without having ownership rights in the underlying share. Fractional share rights (FSRs) which are issued through a contract for difference, are an over the counter derivative. Unlike whole shares, FSRs do not carry any voting rights. As the investor makes further investments in FSRs and ultimately ends up with a whole share, the contract for difference is closed out and ownership whole share is delivered to the investor.

The availability of any share on the EasyEquities platform is based on various factors but is not an indication of value and does not mean that any share is an appropriate investment for you. The availability of any share on the browse shares page does not necessarily indicate any contractual relationship between EasyEquities and the listed company, or the payment of fees for services. Brand Logos are owned by the respective companies and not by EasyEquities. The use of a company’s brand logo does not represent an endorsement of EasyEquities by the company, nor an endorsement of the company by EasyEquities, nor does it necessarily imply any contractual relationship. Further investment disclosures are available on the EasyEquities website. 

EasyEquities is a subsidiary of Purple Group Limited, a company listed on the JSE Limited (PPE)

developer: The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited
description:
The Business Online SA App is the perfect companion to the online banking desktop application.

With the Business Online SA app, you can manage your payments on the go and access your Business Online profile, accounts and transactions from your mobile/ tablet device.

Use the Business Online mobile app to easily:

· Authenticate your Business Online Sign-in

· Create SSVS payments to pre-defined and ad-hoc beneficiaries

· View, create, audit, verify and release inter-account transfers

· View, audit, verify and release payments on all services

· View current, savings, call, fixed deposit and notice deposit account balances on the go

· View interest details on all investment account types

· View the latest transactions from your provisional statement

· Receive audit reports via email

· Switch between profiles

· Reset your password

· View Business Online message alerts

· Provide feedback using the in-app feedback feature

Keep a look out for added functionality coming soon!

Getting started

Install the Business Online SA mobile app and sign in using your Business Online SA credentials

(Note: operators using an OTP sent to their mobile device must use the desktop Business Online application to sign in).

You will have the same Access Rights and Permissions on this app as you have on Business Online.

description:

Legal info
The Standard Bank of South Africa Limited (Reg. No. 1962/000738/06) is an authorised financial services provider in terms of the Financial Advisory and Intermediary Services Act, and is a registered credit provider in terms of the National Credit Act, registration number NCRCP15

For too long, banking solutions haven’t served real South Africans. We see a different future for South Africans. One where your bank is your ally, built on your terms. This is the new standard. Introducing OM Bank, the latest banking offering by Old Mutual. Join the change. Join OM Bank. We’re on your side.

Here’s a snapshot of what you’ll get in the future of banking:

• Fast credit decisions in the palm of your hand: If approved for credit, set up your debit order for repayments and start spending with your virtual credit card in minutes.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.
